statements: DELETE FROM inventory_management WHERE product_id = 101 AND quantity < min_stock;
DELETE FROM orders WHERE order_id = 200 AND quantity_ordered <= 5;
DELETE FROM orders WHERE order_date < '2023-01-01' AND quantity_ordered < 10;
DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE quantity <= min_stock_level AND item_id IN (SELECT item_id FROM Stockouts);
DELETE FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id = 101 AND quantity_in_stock < 10;
